评论详情: I absolutely love these! Great quality!
looks great in first or second hole. but the open easy while wearing them, have lost one yet but do need to keep checking them
They should list the gauge size. It's too big for my daughter. Will be returning
Unique earrings.  Special for the wearer.

评论概述: cute but bigger than i expected
评论详情: theyre kinda big, not really a daily wear type earring but cute and doesnt give me a rash like alot of jewelry does
Slightly bigger than I predicted but over all very cute and did the job as they are my first pair of earing since I took out my guages. ^-^ I am happy and good quality and weight to them.
Perfect for any occasion where you may want a bit of a "I'm all about love, but try me and I may eff you up" vibe. Needless to say, I'll be wearing them daily right now.

These are made of a nice metal, seems like stainless steel. They are shiny and attractive looking. They also are easy to take on and off. I think they were definitely worth the price. I will say, I was expecting them to be a little smaller. They are about the size of a dime and the metal in the heart shape is pretty thick. I’m not sure why I expected them to be smaller but I still wear them a decent amount. They are also very lightweight and comfortable in your ear.
These are so cute, however one earring was fine and one earring was broken. I could not fix it. I did put the  whole one in and it clamped fine. No issues there.
These are great

These are super cute and have enough weight to help keep my lobes stretched since the closing is too small to pair with a tunnel. Quality is ok, I had to bend one of the hooks to get it to stay secure but other than that I where then for a week straight, even to bed, without issue.  Super comfortable, easy to put on/take off, and looks good with anything.

评论概述: Fantastic! Super cute packaging, slightly bent
评论详情: They are so cute! They are sent in a mesh bag which I love. One of them was slightly bent and couldn't latch properly but I was able to fix it.
Just like the picture
Love them

评论概述: These are very cute and not heavy

评论详情: They're a small hoop and are easy to put on, the difficult part is the fact that there's spikes covering it so you can poke your finger.  Luckily if they're handled correctly it won't cause any discomfort.  I'd say they're worth the money if it's going to be a long time used item.  It's not changing copper and is staying black.  They're easy to close and the thin part that goes through the piercing isn't breakable easily.
Super easy to put on, comfortable and light weight.
Thought they would be bigger but the lady who I gifted them to liked them anyhow
These are extremely small. Had I known how small they would have been I would have never gotten them. They are a cute design tho. You can also get them for a buck on something that starts with a T.

评论概述: A little low quality but still cute!
评论详情: One of the piercings keeps popping back open (it might've gotten bent during packing idk), but I'll figure out how to fix it. Be careful, the spikes are a little sharp but they look DOPE!

They are extremely small, which was expected but I didn’t know they would be *that* small. I can’t really see them when I wear them, and if I remember correctly I did have a little trouble getting them on and off as well. Because of that, I just prefer not to wear them altogether. For me, they were not worth the purchase. Other than that, I do love the design and I’m sure anyone else would be happy with them ! They just aren’t for me.
Wear these every day
Cute none the less. Super easy to take off and clean. Don't weigh your ear down no sagging. Nice price
This was a gift fory sister and she loved them! Put them on right away :)

These little heart spike earrings are precious! They're a lot smaller than I thought they would be, and I love that! I am currently wearing them in my second lobe piercing. They're very lightweight, and despite the spikes, very comfortable! Love, love, love!

I love these, they're super cute and I've gotten a few compliments on them. I have super sensitive ears but these don't irritate them at all. They have a nice weight but they're not heavy enough to pull on my ears or anything

They are so cute and excellent quality, made of sturdy metal, and open and close easily. They're super lightweight, too. I've worn them almost every day since I bought them. They've become one of my favorite pairs of earrings (and I have A LOT of earrings).
I love how these look! Great for my sensitive ears. Kinda hard to open but that makes it feel more secure

These are super cute and seem to be good quality It might be a little hard to get them though since they don’t have a pointy end like all other earrings do but once you get them through they are super cute and not heavy
Hard and easy to slice into earring hole. Super cute!
Does hurt or bother
Absolutely love would buy another set
I like them

评论概述: I thought they were so cute...
评论详情: BUT the black PAINT comes off... Leaves pieces in your ear hole too. I'm terribly disappointed because they looked so perfect.
I seen the other reviews about them not staying in but I got a good pair luckily they stay clasped and look super cute on!! I definitely recommend.  I got mine in black🖤🖤🖤😈

I actually love the look of these earrings. They are uncomfortable/hurt when the spikes poke you. Both of my earrings came really loose? I knew there would be an issue but I wore them anyways and managed to lose them both after putting them on for just a few hours. Unfortunately for me, I wasn’t able to find them. Super frustrating. Hoping I can get in contact with seller to maybe get a replacement pair.

I got the spikey heart earrings and I love them! The metal is high quality and heavy but not too heavy. My only issue was that the backs are weird and didn't snap into place well. They were unclasping and falling out but all i had to do was bend one of the backs a little and now they are completely fine. Overall they are super cute and are good quality despite the low price! :)
My daughters loves them, and gets lots of compliments 💚💚💚💚
